parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the ephemeris is enabled or not. Changing this value will not require the ephemeris to be re-validated.

parameters.name: ephemerisId
parameters.description: The AWS Ground Station ephemeris ID.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Customer-provided priority score to establish the order in which overlapping ephemerides should be used. The default for customer-provided ephemeris priority is 1, and higher numbers take precedence. Priority must be 1 or greater.

nested_items.name: ephemerisId
nested_items.description: The AWS Ground Station ephemeris ID.
